page.title: 18Local Issues
page.content: {School Closures:}Harwood Methodist Infant School is to be merged with Hough Fold Juniors and its land sold.Neither the church nor the parents supported the merger.A petition was organised and presented to the Minister of Education,Sir Keith Joseph.He agreed with Bolton Education Authority that due to the falling birthrate there were too many spare places in Harwood schools. {Tipping:}Residents are concerned over the fly-tipping of rubbish along the valleys of Longsight Park. {Teachers' Strike:}This has disrupted local schools as much as anywhere else.Many sporting activities have had to be cancelled.
